summary: Identified 6 documentation ordering issues in Metalogic README where Completeness is presented before Representation (its dependency), incorrect dependency layer diagram, and incomplete Algebraic module documentation. Created Mermaid flowchart design for dependency visualization.

artifacts.summary: Research report with 5 findings: README ordering issues, dependency layer diagram errors, Algebraic module status, Metalogic.lean missing imports, and Mermaid flowchart design
